package.name: jsx3.chart
package.text: Various Charting related constants and utility functions.
package.author: Jesse Costello-Good

nested.name: jsx3.chart.AreaChart
nested.text: An area chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.AreaSeries
nested.text: A data series for an area chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.Axis
nested.text: A base class for all types of axis.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.BCChart
nested.text: Superclass of bar and column chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.BCSeries
nested.text: Shared functionality between BarSeries and ColumnSeries.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.BarChart
nested.text: A bar chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.BarSeries
nested.text: The data series type for a jsx3.chart.BarChart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.BubbleSeries
nested.text: A data series used for a jsx3.chart.BubbleChart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.CartesianChart
nested.text: Base chart class for charts that render on a cartesian plane with x and y axes.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.CategoryAxis
nested.text: Axis type that displays a set of discrete values (categories).

nested.name: jsx3.chart.Chart
nested.text: The base class for all charts in this package.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.ChartComponent
nested.text: A base class for every logical component of a chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.ChartLabel
nested.text: A chart component to render a text box.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.ColumnChart
nested.text: A column chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.ColumnSeries
nested.text: The data series type for a jsx3.chart.ColumnChart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.GridLines
nested.text: A chart component that renders a grid of lines and fills aligned with an x and y axis.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.Legend
nested.text: Chart component that renders a simple legend.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.LineChart
nested.text: A line chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.LineSeries
nested.text: A data series for a line chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.LinearAxis
nested.text: Type of axis that displays a linear range of values.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.LogarithmicAxis
nested.text: An axis that displays a range of values logarithmically (base^n and base^(n+1) occupy same visual space).

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PieChart
nested.text: A pie chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PieSeries
nested.text: A data series for a pie chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PlotChart
nested.text: An plot (scatter/point/bubble) chart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PlotSeries
nested.text: Class encapsulating behavior shared by PointSeries and BubbleSeries

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PointSeries
nested.text: A data series used for a jsx3.chart.PointChart.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.RadialChart
nested.text: Base class for radial charts (pie chart is only example so far).

nested.name: jsx3.chart.Series
nested.text: The base class for all data series classes.

nested.name: jsx3.chart.PointRenderer
nested.text: Objects that implement this interface may be used in Line/Area/Point/Bubble charts to render the points that appear at each datapoint.

method.name: addGradient
method.text: Utility function, combines a vector fill and the property editor string format of a gradient

method.name: asNumber
method.text: Utility function, converts a value to a Number

method.name: isCategoryAxis
method.text: Tests whether an object is an Axis that displays set of discreet categories

method.name: isValueAxis
method.text: Tests whether an object is an Axis that displays a range of number values

method.name: parseGradient
method.text: Utility function, parses the property editor string format of a gradient into its constituent parts

method.name: splitBox

param.name: left
param.text: the left value of the box to split

param.name: top
param.text: the top value of the box to split

param.name: width
param.text: the width value of the box to split

param.name: height
param.text: the height value of the box to split

param.name: placement
param.text: {top,left,right,bottom} where to place the first sub-box

param.name: w
param.text: the desired width of the first sub-box

param.name: h
param.text: the desired height of the first sub-box

method.text: Splits a rectangular box in two pieces.
